trans-unit.source: Exposes and updates membership user information stored in an Active Directory data store.
trans-unit.target: Viser og oppdateres medlemskap brukerinformasjonen som lagres i et Active Directory-datalager.

trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is used to represent a single membership user in the Active Directory membership data store.
trans-unit.target: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser-objektet brukes til å representere en enkelt medlemskap bruker i Active Directory medlemskap datalageret.

trans-unit.source: It exposes information about the membership user such as the e-mail address, and provides functionality for the membership user such as the ability to change or reset his or her password.
trans-unit.target: Den viser informasjon om medlemskap brukeren som for eksempel e-postadressen og inneholder funksjoner for medlemskap brukeren som for eksempel muligheten til å endre eller tilbakestille passordet sitt.

trans-unit.source: An ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is returned by the application's membership provider whenever the application is configured to use an Active Directory data store.
trans-unit.target: Objektets ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser returneres av leverandøren for programmets medlemskapet når programmet er konfigurert til å bruke et Active Directory-datalager.

trans-unit.source: In an application that can be configured to use different data stores, or in an application that uses multiple data stores, you can refer to the base class, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>.
trans-unit.target: I en applikasjon som kan konfigureres hvis du vil bruke annen lagrer eller i en applikasjon som bruker flere datalager, kan du se basisklassen <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: Because the ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object does not implement the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> properties, you must be prepared to handle the <xref:System.NotSupportedException> that is thrown when these members are accessed on an ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object.
trans-unit.target: Fordi ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser-objektet ikke har implementert i <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>og <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A>Egenskaper, må du være klar til å håndtere den <xref:System.NotSupportedException>som forårsakes når disse medlemmene åpnes i et ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser-objekt.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser class implements internal optimizations used by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> class to minimize the number of attribute updates that occur when calling the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser klassen implementerer intern profileringsoptimaliseringer som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>klassen for å redusere antallet attributtet oppdateringer som oppstår når du kaller den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: It also serializes the <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> representation (available in the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> property) so that an ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object can be serialized and deserialized without throwing exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Det også serializes den <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>representasjon (tilgjengelig i den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>egenskapen) slik at et ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser-objekt kan serialiseres og deserialiseres uten at det oppstår unntak.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> </xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>

trans-unit.source: A ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is returned by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> methods or as part of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> returned by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Et ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser-objekt som er returnert av den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>og <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>metoder eller som en del av en <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection>ble returnert av den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: An ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is required by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method when you want to update the information for an existing membership user.
trans-unit.target: Objektets ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser kreves av den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>metoden når du vil oppdatere informasjonen for en eksisterende medlemskap-bruker.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser properties are mapped to Active Directory attributes.
trans-unit.target: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser egenskaper er tilordnet til Active Directory-attributter.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser properties and their default attribute mappings.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser egenskapene ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser og deres standard attributtet tilordninger.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Default directory attribute|Can be mapped?| |--------------|---------------------------------|--------------------| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>|`securityIdentifier`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName%2A>|`userPrincipalName`|Yes, but must be either userPrincipalName or sAMAccountName| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A>|`comment`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate%2A>|`whenCreated`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email%2A>|`mail`|Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>|n/a|Not supported by <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A>|n/a|Not supported by <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate%2A>|`pwdLastSet`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion%2A>|none, but must be mapped to an attribute if using question-and-answer security for password reset or retrieval.|Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A>|`User-Account-Control` (AD)
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standard directory attributtet | Kan tilordnes? | |--------------|---------------------------------|--------------------| | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>| `securityIdentifier`| Ikke | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName%2A>| `userPrincipalName`| Ja, men må være userPrincipalName eller sAMAccountName | | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A>| `comment`| Ikke | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate%2A>| `whenCreated`| Ikke | | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email%2A>| `mail`| Ja, men må være et enkeltverdier attributt av typen Unicode-streng. | | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>|n/a| Ikke støttes av <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>. | | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A>|n/a| Ikke støttes av <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>. | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate%2A>| `pwdLastSet`| Ikke | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion%2A>| none, men må tilordnes til et attributt om bruk av spørsmål og svar-sikkerhet for tilbakestilling av passord eller henting. | Ja, men må være et enkeltverdier attributt av typen Unicode-streng. | | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A>| `User-Account-Control` (AD)</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: `mDS-UserAccountDisabled` (ADAM)|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A>|computed from `lockoutTime` and the AD lockout duration (AD on Windows 2000)
trans-unit.target: `mDS-UserAccountDisabled`(ADAM) | Ikke | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A>| beregnet fra `lockoutTime` og AD-låsevarighet (AD på Windows 2000)</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A>

trans-unit.source: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (AD on Windows Server 2003)
trans-unit.target: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed`(AD på Windows Server 2003)

trans-unit.source: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (ADAM)|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate%2A>|If locked out due to too many bad password attempts, the lockout time attribute is returned.
trans-unit.target: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed`(ADAM) | Ikke | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate%2A>| Hvis låst på grunn av for mange feil passordforsøk, returneres attributtet låsing-klokkeslett.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If locked out due to too many bad password answer attempts, the value stored in the attribute defined by `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` is returned.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er lagret i attributtet er definert av, hvis låst på grunn av for mange feil svar på passord, prøver `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` returneres.

trans-unit.source: If locked out due to both a bad password and too many bad password attempts, the most recent date/time value is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis låst på grunn av både et ugyldig passord og feil passord for mange forsøk, returneres den siste dato/klokkeslett-verdien.

trans-unit.source: If the account is not locked out, return 1/1/1753 for SQL compatibility.|No|
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontoen ikke er låst, returnere 1/1/1753 for SQL-kompatibilitet. | Ikke |

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of an <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref> object for a class that inherits the <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av en <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"> </xref> objekt for klassen som arver den <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser constructor is not intended to be used from your code.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser skal ikke brukes fra koden.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref> class with the specified property values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"> </xref> klassen med de angitte egenskapsverdiene.

trans-unit.source: Creating a new <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object does not add a new membership user object to the membership data store.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>objektet ikke legge til et nytt medlemskap brukerobjekt i datalageret medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: To add a new membership user to the membership data store, use the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil legge til en ny bruker medlemskap i datalageret medlemskap, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method returns an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object for the membership user added to the data store.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>metoden returnerer en <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>objekt for medlemskap brukeren lagt til datakilden.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objects are commonly constructed in application code for use with the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method, although you can also pass an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object returned from the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> method to the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method as well.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>objekter er vanligvis konstrueres i applikasjonen kode for bruk med den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>metoden, selv om du kan også sende en <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>objektet som ble returnert fra den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, eller <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A>metoden den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>metoden samt.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objects are also commonly constructed by membership provider implementations for the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>objektene er ofte konstruert av medlemskap leverandøren implementeringer for den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ProviderName*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ProviderName*>for brukeren medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ProviderName*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName*>for brukeren medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey*>for brukeren medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email*> address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email*>postadressen til brukeren som medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion*>for brukeren medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment*>for brukeren medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved*> value for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved*>verdien for brukeren medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut*> value for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut*>verdien for brukeren medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate*>for brukeren medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate*>for brukeren medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate*>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren brukes ikke.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate*>for brukeren medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate*>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren brukes ikke.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate*>for brukeren medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate*>for brukeren medlemskap.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets application-specific information for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir programspesifikk informasjon for brukeren medlemskap.

trans-unit.source: The Comment property can be used to store custom information for a membership user that is specific to an application.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Comment kan brukes til å lagre egendefinert informasjon for medlemskap bruker som er spesifikke for en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: The amount of information that can be stored in the `Comment` property for an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> is defined by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Hvor mye informasjon som kan lagres i det `Comment` -egenskapen for en <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>er definert av <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: The Comment property is mapped to the `Comment` default Active Directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: Comment-egenskapen er tilordnet til den `Comment` standard Active Directory-attributt.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be remapped to another attribute.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke tilordnes til et annet attributt.

trans-unit.source: Application-specific information for the Active Directory member stored in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Comment" name="Comment" href=""></xref> directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: Programspesifikk informasjon for Active Directory-medlemmet som er lagret i den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Comment" name="Comment" href=""> </xref> directory-attributt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the e-mail address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir e-postadressen til brukeren som medlemskap.

trans-unit.source: The Email property is mapped to the `Mail` directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: E-post-egenskapen er tilordnet til den `Mail` directory-attributt.

trans-unit.source: This property can be remapped in the Web.config file by setting the `attributeMapUserName` attribute in the [providers Element for profile (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f) element for profiles.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan tilordnes i Web.config-filen ved å angi den `attributeMapUserName` attributt i den [leverandører elementet for profilen (ASP.NET innstillingsskjemaet)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f) -element for profiler.

trans-unit.source: The e-mail address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: E-postadressen til brukeren som medlemskap.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the membership user can be authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om medlemskap kan godkjenne brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> value for a membership user is checked during the call to <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>Verdien for en medlemskap bruker kontrolleres under kall til <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>av <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: If the IsApproved property returns `false`, the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method returns `false` even if the supplied user name and password are correct.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen IsApproved returnerer `false`, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>metoden returnerer `false` selv om det angitte brukernavnet og passordet er riktig.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: The IsApproved property is mapped to one of the following Active Directory attributes.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen IsApproved er tilordnet til en av følgende Active Directory-attributter.

trans-unit.source: ||| |-|-| |Active Directory|`User-Account-Control`| |Active Directory Application Mode|`msDS-UserAccountDisabled`| This property cannot be remapped to another attribute.
trans-unit.target: ||| |-|-| | Active Directory | `User-Account-Control`| | Modus for Active Directory | `msDS-UserAccountDisabled`| Denne egenskapen kan ikke tilordnes til et annet attributt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can be authenticated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis brukeren kan godkjennes; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception in all cases
trans-unit.target: Oppstår det et <xref:System.NotSupportedException>unntak i alle tilfellene</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: The LastActivityDate property is not supported by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen LastActivityDate støttes ikke av <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>klassen.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: Attempting to get or set the value will always throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å hente eller angi verdien vil alltid throw <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Always throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.

trans-unit.source: any attempt to get or set the LastActivityDate property.

trans-unit.source: Gets the user identifier from the Active Directory data store for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Henter den bruker-IDen fra Active Directory-datalageret for medlemskap brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The ProviderUserKey property exposes the identifier from the membership data source generically typed as an `object`.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ProviderUserKey viser identifikatoren fra medlemskap datakilden generisk typeangitt som en `object`.

trans-unit.source: The ProviderUserKey class can be cast as a <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> object.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ProviderUserKey kan brukes som en <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>

trans-unit.source: The user identifier from the Active Directory data store for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Bruker-ID fra Active Directory-dataene lager for medlemskap brukeren.
